name: Deterring Delinquents from a Dragon's Dwelling
name_original: Deterring Delinquents from a Dragon's Dwelling
description: You are a dragon trying to learn how to breath fire, but you need cash for the lessons, stop those who try to steal your dinero and get some for wizard lessons in the process, you run out of money and your dreams are over. Since you can't breath fire you have to throw your cold hard cash at them.
